title: Soul in Color
description: A powerful jazz portrait of a saxophonist painted in expressive black lines against bold strips of magenta, ivory and sunset orange. The artwork captures the warmth, improvisation and raw soul of live music. Perfect for music rooms, lounges and creative spaces.

title: Electric Sonata
description: A grand piano dissolves into fuchsia, turquoise and peach, imagining what a melody looks like in motion.

title: Skyline Drift
description: A vibrant abstract cityscape where cool ocean blues melt into glowing gold reflections. Bold vertical strokes create the illusion of skyscrapers dissolving into water. A dynamic statement piece by RA that brings energy and motion into modern interiors.

title: Nordic Mirage
description: Warm copper cuts through cool violets and blues, like distant sails drifting across Scandinavian water.

title: Galactic Guardians
description: Playful figures from a galaxy far away rendered in bold lines and saturated colour, celebrating pure nostalgia.

title: Oreo
description: A vibrant dog portrait that catches the sparkle of a wagging tail and an always-ready adventure.

title: Mona in Silence
description: A contemporary Mona Lisa raises a finger to her lips, inviting the viewer into a quiet, shared secret.

title: Tropical Messenger
description: A stylised bird in coral, gold and teal stands like a herald of warm winds and late summer evenings.

title: Gentle Giants
description: Mother and cub pandas blend into one flowing silhouette, a quiet portrait of warmth, patience and care.

title: Autumn
description: Vertical strokes of crimson and amber rise from a misty grey city, like embers glowing in the evening air.

title: Golden Flight
description: A bird stretches its wings against a soft gold sky, each feather painted in layered strokes of colour.

title: Chromatic Reverie
description: Modern pop art portrait of Audrey Hepburn in bold geometric blocks of yellow, cyan, violet and pink. The calm side profile and vivid colours create a statement piece perfect for contemporary living rooms and design-led interiors.

title: Ali
description: Powerful figurative painting of Mohammed Ali in a vivid primary colours. Dynamic brushwork and graphic shapes capture the energy of the ring, ideal for sports lovers, home gyms or bold office spaces.

title: Soft Keys
description: Minimalist jazz art print style painting of a pianist at the piano, rendered in black against a soft pink background. A sophisticated choice for music rooms, lounges and Scandinavian-inspired interiors.

title: Blue Horizon Jump
description: Energetic snowboard painting with a rider soaring above snowy mountains, sliced by a striking turquoise diagonal. Perfect wall art for ski chalets, mountain cabins and action-sport enthusiasts.

title: Retro Rebel
description: Take over in style. Vintage comic-book vibes meet modern street art, ideal for creative studios, home offices and collectors of edgy wall art.

title: Golden Wanderer
description: Striking elephant painting in black, white and warm amber tones on a rich orange background. This modern wildlife artwork adds character and warmth to hallways, dining rooms and nature-inspired interiors.

title: Yin to my Yang
description: A serene minimalist artwork depicting two cats curled into a perfect yin-yang embrace. The clean lines and soft contrast symbolize harmony, balance and peaceful companionship. A calming centrepiece ideal for modern interiors, pet lovers and Scandinavian-inspired spaces.

title: Frida Doggo
description: What if Frida Kahlo was a dog? A striking modern portrait of a Dalmatian adorned with a vibrant crown of flowers. Playful yet dignified, the artwork blends bold colours and expressive ink details, capturing the personality and elegance of the beloved spotted companion. Perfect for bright, stylish interiors looking for a touch of charm and character.

title: Spotted Silence
description: Minimalist black-and-white Dalmatian artwork created with expressive ink splashes and negative space. A clean, Scandinavian-style piece that fits perfectly in modern bedrooms, hallways or pet-friendly homes.

title: The Last Note
description: Package deal - Expressive jazz artists, bathed in warm peach and orange tones. Ideal statement art for music lovers, cocktail lounges and stylish living rooms.

title: The glorious prison of Marilyn
description: Modern jazz wall art featuring a trumpeter in motion, silhouetted in black against bold planes of blue and pastel orange. A lively centrepiece for bars, studios and contemporary city apartments.

title: NeoNoir Nights
description: Cyberpunk art portrait inspired by classic Hollywood movies, outlined in bold black against vertical rainbow stripes. A luxurious statement painting for feature walls in living rooms, boutiques and hotel lobbies.

title: The Majestic
description: A panther emerges from lush green leaves and pastel light, its gaze calm but unblinking.
